DOC.brief_summary: This is a study of visual outcomes in retinal disease that seeks to identify the causes of visual loss. This data will be used to predict which patients are at risk of losing vision and how they can be better treated.
DOC.brief_title: Causes of Visual Loss in Retinal Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This is a study of visual outcomes in retinal disease. It is an observational study of patients who have been seen in the retinal clinic, and involves a retrospective casenotes analysis to identify patients who have suffered visual loss and the reason for that visual loss. These data will be analysed to enable the identification of factors that predict visual loss in patients who present earlier in the course of their disease.
DOC.criteria: patients with a diagnosis of ocular inflammation patients with at least 6 months of followup patients without a diagnosis of ocular inflammation patients with less than 6 months of followup
